original_text: A ruler may give fools too much authority. At the same time, rich people have no authority. A ruler may give fools too much authority.
korean_text: 우매한 자가 크게 높은 지위들을 얻고 부자들이 낮은 지위에 앉는도다

sentences.original_text: A ruler may give fools too much authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 통치자가 어리석은 자에게 과도한 권위를 부여할 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: At the same time, rich people have no authority.
A ruler may give fools too much authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 통치자가 어리석은 자에게 과도한 권위를 부여할 수 있다.
